name: Return: A Pigeon Game
description:
Return: A Pigeon Game is a game about a regular pigeon delivering packages. Once you deliver a package, you've still got an adventure on the way back. 

This was the first game and first game jam for most of the team! We would love to expand on the ideas here in the future, as we ran out of time. Please enjoy!

Controls: 

WASD / Arrow keys to move.

Spacebar to jump.

Left Shift to Dash. You have 2 dashes that will reset after each level.

R to respawn/reload the level.

Credits:

Benjamin Yan - Programmer

Bryan Zheng - Programmer

Lawrence Luong - Writer, Artist Lead, Level Design

Adam Ngo - Level Design, Project Manager

Chris Tam - Artist

Music: "Staccatos" by Crowander

Borrowed tiles from Pixel Frog's "Pixel Adventure 1" Asset pack

and Cainos' "Pixel Platformer - Village Props" Asset pack
